Title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer
Description:
About the Role

We are looking for an AI engineer who wants to help shape the future of retail and our company. As an early stage engineer you will:

Work directly with our founding team.

Apply the latest AI techniques to solve real world problems.

Design, build, and refine datasets to evaluate and continuously improve our products.

Ship features that our users care about, wherever they are in the stack.

Participate in strategy and product ideation sessions, influencing our product roadmap.

Working at Marx AI will be hard work, it will be messy and at times it will be stressful. However, you will:

Identify and help build innovative cutting-edge solutions

Shape the company's vision and will have a direct impact on its success

Have the opportunity for fast career growth and learning

Have the opportunity to participate in growing venture




Apply if:

You have experience with our stack: Python, LlamaIndex / LangChain, PyTorch, HuggingFace, FastAPI, Postgres, SQLAlchemy, Alembic, OpenAI, Docker, Azure, Typescript, React.

You have hands-on experience working with LLMs, RAG architectures, NLP, or applying Machine Learning to solve real-world problems.

You have a strong track record of building datasets for training and/or evaluating machine learning models

You enjoy diving deep into the domain, understanding the problem, and focusing on delivering value to the customer

You thrive in a fast paced environment

You like to take ownership and work independently

You are excited about joining an early-stage venture




Not applicable if:

You want to work on a single layer of the application.

You prefer to work on well-defined problems.

You need clear, pre-defined processes.

You prefer a low-pressure environment.

You have experience with our stack: Python, LlamaIndex / LangChain, PyTorch, HuggingFace, FastAPI, Postgres, SQLAlchemy, Alembic, OpenAI, Docker, Azure, Typescript, React.

You have hands-on experience working with LLMs, RAG architectures, NLP, or applying Machine Learning to solve real-world problems.

You have a strong track record of building datasets for training and/or evaluating machine learning models

You enjoy diving deep into the domain, understanding the problem, and focusing on delivering value to the customer

You thrive in a fast paced environment

You like to take ownership and work independently

You are excited about joining an early-stage venture


Not applicable if:

You want to work on a single layer of the application.

You prefer to work on well-defined problems.

You need clear, pre-defined processes.

You prefer a low-pressure environment.

Title: AI /NLP/ ML Expert
HTML:
We currently have a vacancy for an AI /NLP/ ML Expert fluent in English, to offer his/her services as an expert who will be based in Brussels, Belgium. The work will be carried out either on the company's premises or on site at the customer premises. In the context of the first assignment, the successful candidate will be integrated in the Development team of the company that will closely cooperate with a major client's IT team on site.

Your tasks

  • AI solution analysis, design and implementation in close coordination with team management and AI technical lead;
  • Propose adequate machine learning models and employ NLP techniques to extract valuable insights from large datasets;
  • Deliver AI and ML training to technical and non-technical (business) users;
  • Data modelling in the context of data science and AI;
  • Creation of industrial solutions to exploit data science and AI solutions;
  • Support the development of generative AI solutions in knowledge management;
  • Engage with various teams, analyze business requirements and translate them into AI solutions.


Requirements

  • Master's degree in IT or relevant discipline, combined with minimum 13 years of relevant working experience in IT;
  • Minimum 5 years demonstrable project expertise in the command of Python and R proficiency in an AI/ML context focusing on the use of relevant libraries, including but not limited to: NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, SpaCy, NLTK, PyTorch, TensorFlow, HuggingFace, dplyr, stringr, tidymodels, torch for R, ggplot;
  • Minimum 3 year project experience (expertise) of Semantic NLP techniques, including semantic representation, text splitting, analysis, similarity and parsing;
  • Minimum 3 years of professional experience in each of the following 3 areas in the context of Artificial Intelligence (or Machine Learning or Data Science or Data Analytics) projects: (1) Data Analysis; (2) Business Requirements Gathering; and (3) Project Management;
  • Minimum 3 years of hands-on, project-specific expertise using Large Language Models (e.g. OpenAI, LLaMa and Mistal) in a business environment;
  • Minimum 5 years of professional experience in developing AI solutions, including machine learning and NLP;
  • Proven experience with Deep Learning models and NLP techniques;
  • Excellent knowledge of machine learning techniques and algorithms, such as k-NN, Naive Bayes, SVM, Decision Forests, Neural Network, and/or artificial intelligence frameworks;
  • Experience in cleaning and preparing data for AI and Machine Learning (statistical) models;
  • Minimum 3 years of experience with cloud services (AWS, Azure, GCP) and containerization tools (e.g. Docker) for the deployment of AI and machine learning applications;
  • Minimum 2 years of experience with version control systems (Git Hub/GitLab) and ETL tools (e.g. Data Services, Talend etc);
  • Technical proficiency regarding database design development, data models, techniques for data mining, and segmentation;
  • Experience with Knowledge Graphs and SPARQL would be considered an asset;
  • Excellent command of the English language and good command of French.


Benefits

If you are seeking a career in an exciting and dynamic company, where you will offer your services as part of a team of a major European Institution, operating in an international, multilingual and multicultural environment where you can expect real chances to make a difference, please send us your detailed CV in English, quoting reference (18271/02/2025).

We offer a competitive remuneration (either on contract basis or remuneration with full benefits package), based on qualifications and experience. All applications will be treated as confidential.

EUROPEAN DYNAMICS (ED) (www.eurodyn.com) is a leading Software, Information and Communication Technologies company, operating internationally (Athens, Brussels, Luxembourg, Copenhagen, Stockholm, London, Nicosia, Hong-Kong, Valetta, etc). The company employs over 1000 engineers, IT experts and consultants (around 3% PhD, 36% MSc and 53% BSc or equivalent). We design and develop software applications using state-of-the-art technology. The group generates annual revenues in the range of EURO 40 million, with an EBITDA in the range of 20%. The value of our contract portfolio exceeds EURO 250 million. EUROPEAN DYNAMICS is a renowned supplier of IT services to government institutions, multinational corporations, public administrations and multinational companies, research and academic institutes.

As part of our dedication to the diversity of our workforce, we are committed to Equal Employment Opportunity without regard for race, color, national origin, ethnicity, gender, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, or religion.


EUROPEAN DYNAMICS (ED) adheres to the General Data Protection Regulation principles by applying its Privacy Policy as published in www.eurodyn.com/privacy. By submitting an application to this position and by sharing your personal data with ED, you acknowledge and accept its Policy and authorise ED to process your personal data for the purposes of the company's recruitment opportunities, in line to the Policy.

Title: Junior Developer (Python)
Description:
Squareflow is a growing company founded in 2020 by entrepreneurs (just like you). We embrace technology to create business value with Odoo as an enabler. We believe that any business can be digital first.




To strengthen our team, we are looking for junior developer. As a developer, you'll be in regular contact with clients and our teams in order to deliver solutions based on understanding of their specific needs in terms of business business/IT alignment.




Function:




As a junior developer, your specific tasks and responsibilities may include:




Develop solutions for our clients from many different industries, sectors and company size
Support and maintain those specific solutions
Implement the client's needs in the Odoo solution before configuring it
Create training material and documentation for Odoo users
Deliver informative, well-organized demos to business teams
Accompany and train end-users to the new tool (train the trainer approach) on Odoo and related applications
Develop and maintain processes to continuously monitor data quality
Coordinate test execution to ensure that all technical customizations and configurations follow industry and delivery best practices
Contribute to the daily development of Squareflow




Your profile :




Bachelor or Master degree (preferably in business, engineering or computer science)
Several programming languages ( Python & JavaScript)
Excellent communication (written and oral) in French and English and interpersonal skills
Structural thinking
Ability to learn and evolve quickly
Ability to work autonomously but also in team with a “Can Do attitude”
Creatively and pragmatic in a problem-solving environment
Fast-learner with a specific interest in Digital




WHAT’S IN IT FOR YOU?




More that a technical knowledge combined with our business positioning, we live our values on a daily basis : teamwork, transparency, commitment.




We offer:

A competitive salary package, with car and other benefits
Exciting projects with a strong use of Odoo
The opportunity to grow your superpower in a challenging context
The possibility to follow regular trainings
The opportunity to think, build and adopt beyond solutions




Squareflow is an equal opportunity employer. We will not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, gender, age, national origin, disability or sexual orientation, in any of its activities or operations.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Taken en verantwoordelijkheden

Hoe maak jij mee het verschil?

Als Senior Data Scientist speel je een sleutelrol in de analyse van databases om de commerciële B2B- en B2C-strategie te bepalen zowel voor nationale als internationale klanten. Je komt terecht op de afdeling Customer Data, verantwoordelijk voor klantdata-analyse, marketing automation en customer data management.

Wat is jouw rol bij NMBS ?

Als Senior Data Scientist ben je verantwoordelijk voor de analyse van grote en complexe datasets, de ontwikkeling van voorspellende modellen en de informatievoorziening die de strategische beslissingen van NMBS ondersteunt.

Dat Betekent


Je ontwikkelt nieuwe strategische- en marketingmodellen en verbetert bestaande modellen (bv. prospectiemodel voor het B2B-segment voor Account Managers).
Je analyseert en interpreteert reizigersgegevens om strategische inzichten te verschaffen aan managers van andere afdelingen.
Je ontwikkelt visuals en rapporten in tools zoals Power BI om de resultaten op een duidelijke, beknopte, toegankelijke en overtuigende manier te presenteren.
Je voert geografische en ruimtelijke data-analyses uit en ondersteunt transportanalyses.
Je hebt een transversale rol . Je treedt op als adviseur en vertrouwenspersoon als het gaat om klantgegevens.


Waarom is deze job iets voor jou ?


Je hebt een masterdiploma in een relevante richting (bvb. data-analyse, statistiek, geografie, economie, ingenieurswetenschappen, ...) EN je hebt een eerste professionele ervaring (van minstens 5 jaar) als data analist.


Je Herkent Jezelf In De Volgende Competenties


Je bent bedreven in multivariate analysetechnieken en hebt ervaring in het beheren en analyseren van geografische gegevens.
Je kunt tools voor gegevensvisualisatie en -analyse gebruiken, zoals Power BI en PySpark.
Als uitstekende communicator weet je complexe ideeën helder en effectief uit te leggen aan verschillende gesprekspartners.
Je kunt technisch complexe projecten leiden en je collega's coachen om de gestelde doelen te bereiken.
Je bent in staat om problemen creatief en samen met cross-functionele teams binnen NMBS op te lossen.
Je kunt je gemakkelijk aanpassen aan de behoeften van het project en de verwachtingen van interne belanghebbenden.
Je begrijpt een gesprek in het Frans.


Elke persoon is uniek. Het is belangrijk voor ons dat je jezelf kunt zijn. Dat is wat NMBS sterker maakt. Daarom hechten we veel belang aan diversiteit en inclusie.

Wat mag je van ons verwachten?

Als Senior Data Scientist kies je voor een job die impact heeft op de commerciële strategie van NMBS. Je komt terecht in een prettige werkomgeving, met maatschappelijke relevantie en je wordt omringd door gemotiveerde en vriendelijke collega's.

Daarnaast Kan Je Rekenen Op


Een aantrekkelijk salaris aangevuld met een 13de maand, een onkostenvergoeding, maaltijdcheques en een collectieve en individuele bonus.
Een deel van het salaris wordt aangeboden in de vorm van een flexibel budget. Je kan kiezen voor fietslease, flexwagen, terugbetaling pensioensparen, enz.
Een hospitalisatie- en groepsverzekering.
Een flexibel uurrooster, een goede balans tussen werk en privé dankzij 33 vrije dagen per jaar.
Een treinabonnement in België, voordelen op internationale lijnen en een fietsvergoeding.
Voordelen voor je gezin, zoals kortingen op familie-uitjes en in winkelketens.


Waar ga je werken?

Je werkt in Brussel op de afdeling Customer Services, vlak bij het station Brussel-Zuid en van thuis uit. Je komt terecht in het Customer Data team dat bestaat uit 8 collega’s.

What’s next ?


Je solliciteert op onze jobsite.
We bekijken je cv en je motivatie.
We nodigen je uit voor een online gesprek om kennis te maken. Om je voor te bereiden op dit gesprek, vragen wij je een persoonlijkheidsvragenlijst en een online redeneertest in te vullen.
In een tweede fase, en om je een goed idee van de functie te geven, zullen wij je een eliminerende casestudy voorleggen.
Als de case study overtuigend is, wordt, indien nodig; een tweede gesprek georganiseerd.
Verloopt alles positief? Dan doen wij je een contractvoorstel.
Je bent klaar voor je eerste werkdag!


Heb je nog vragen?

Jobreq: 50260

Over de inhoud van de functie

Lander Bijnens

Lander.bijnens@nmbs.be

Over De Selectieprocedure

Anne-Sophie Heyvaert

Annesophie.heyvaert@nmbs.be

+32 499 06 55 75

Title: Data Scientist _FR
Description:
Comment pouvez-vous faire la différence ?

En tant que Senior Data Scientist au sein de notre Direction Customer Services, vous jouez un rôle clé dans l’analyse de nos bases de données afin de définir la stratégie commerciale pour le clients B2B et B2C de la SNCB, tant au niveau national qu’international. Vous rejoignez le département Customer Data, responsable de l'analyse des données clients, de l'automatisation du marketing et de la gestion des données clients.

Quel est votre rôle à la SNCB ?

Au sein du département Customer Data, vous serez responsable de l'analyse d'ensembles de données volumineux et complexes, du développement de modèles prédictifs et de la fourniture d'informations qui soutiennent les décisions stratégiques de la SNCB.

En tant que Data Scientist:


Vous développez de nouveaux modèles stratégiques et marketing et améliorer les modèles existants (ex: modèle de prospection pour le segment B2B pour les Account Managers).
Vous analysez et interprétez les données des voyageurs pour fournir des informations stratégiques à certains Head of d’autres départements.
Vous développez des visuels et des rapports dans des outils tels que Power BI pour présenter les résultats de manière claire, syntétique, accessible et convainquante.
Vous effectuez des analyses de données géographiques et spatiales et vous soutenez les analyses de transport.
Vous collaborez de manière transversale au sein de l'entreprise. Vous agissez en tant que conseiller et personne de confiance en matière de données clients.


Un job fait pour vous ?


Vous êtes titulaire d'un diplôme de master (ou équivalent par expérience) dans une orientation pertinente (par exemple, analyse de données, statistiques, géographie, économie, ingénieur civil, ... ) ET vous disposez ’au moins 3 ans d’expérience comme Data Analyst.


Vous vous reconnaissez dans les compétences suivantes:


Vous maîtrisez les techniques d'analyse mutlivariables et avez de l'expérience dans la gestion et l'analyse de données géographiques.
Vous êtes capable d'utiliser des outils de visualisation et d'analyse de données tels que Power BI et PySpark.
En tant qu’excellent communicateur, vous savez expliquer clairement et efficacement des idées complexes à différents interlocuteurs.
Vous pouvez diriger des projets techniquement complexes et coacher vos collègues pour atteindre les objectifs fixés.
Vous êtes capable de résoudre des problèmes de manière creative et dans la collaboration avec des équipes transversales au sein de la SNCB.
Vous vous adaptez facilement aux besoins du projet et aux attentes des parties prenantes internes.
Vous comprenez une conversation en néerlandais.


Chaque personne est unique. Il est important pour nous que vous puissiez être vous-même. C’est ce qui rend la SNCB plus forte. C’est pourquoi nous accordons beaucoup d’importance à la diversité et à l’inclusion.

Qu'avons-nous à vous offrir ?

En tant que Senior Data Scientist, vous choisissez un job qui a un impact sur la stratégie commerciale de la SNCB. Vous vous trouverez dans un environnement de travail agréable, avec une pertinence sociétale et vous êtes entouré de collègues motivés et sympathiques.

En outre, vous pouvez compter sur :


Un salaire attractif complété d'un 13e mois, d'une indemnité de frais, des chèques-repas et d'un bonus collectif et individuel.
Une partie du salaire est offerte sous forme de budget flexible. Vous pouvez opter pour la location d'un vélo, d’une voiture flex, pour le remboursement de l'épargne-pension, etc.
Une assurance hospitalisation et collective.
Un horaire flexible, un bon équilibre entre vie professionnelle et vie privée grâce à 33 jours de congés par an.
Un abonnement de train en Belgique, des avantages sur les lignes internationales et une indemnité vélo.
Des avantages pour votre famille comme des réductions sur les sorties en famille et dans les magasins.


Où allez-vous travailler ?

Vous travaillez à Bruxelles dans la Direction Customer Services, à proximité de la gare de Bruxelles-Midi et à domicile. Vous rejoignez l’équipe Customer Data composée de 8 personnes.

What’s next ?


Vous postulez sur notre jobsite
Nous analysons votre CV et votre motivation.
Nous vous invitons à un entretien de sélection (en ligne). Afin de préparer cet entretien, nous vous demanderons de compléter un questionnaire de personnalité et un test de raisonnement en ligne.
Dans un second temps, et afin de vous donner une bonne idée de la fonction, nous vous soumettrons un case study éliminatoire.
Si le case study est concluant, un deuxième entretien sera organisé si nécessaire.
Tout se déroule de manière positive ? Nous vous faisons une proposition de contrat.
Vous êtes prêt·e pour votre premier jour de travail !


Avez-vous encore des questions?

Jobreq: 50260

Sur le contenu de la fonction

Lander Bijnens

Lander.bijnens@sncb.be

Sur la procédure de sélection :

Anne-Sophie Heyvaert

Annesophie.heyvaert@sncb.be

+32 499 06 55 75

  • Des avantages pour votre famille comme des réductions sur les sorties en famille et dans les magasins.

Où allez-vous travailler ?

Vous travaillez à Bruxelles dans la Direction Customer Services, à proximité de la gare de Bruxelles-Midi et à domicile. Vous rejoignez l’équipe Customer Data composée de 8 personnes.

What’s next ?

  • Vous postulez sur notre jobsite
  • Nous analysons votre CV et votre motivation.
  • Nous vous invitons à un entretien de sélection (en ligne). Afin de préparer cet entretien, nous vous demanderons de compléter un questionnaire de personnalité et un test de raisonnement en ligne.
  • Dans un second temps, et afin de vous donner une bonne idée de la fonction, nous vous soumettrons un case study éliminatoire.
  • Si le case study est concluant, un deuxième entretien sera organisé si nécessaire.
  • Tout se déroule de manière positive ? Nous vous faisons une proposition de contrat.
  • Vous êtes prêt·e pour votre premier jour de travail !

Avez-vous encore des questions?

Jobreq: 50260

Lander.bijnens@sncb.be

Sur la procédure de sélection :

Anne-Sophie Heyvaert

Annesophie.heyvaert@sncb.be

Title: AI Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
YOUR JOB IN A NUTSHELL

As an AI Machine Learning Engineer you promote the adoption of best standards in industrial code development across the Machine Learning and AI community. You do so by developing ML pipelines that are production-ready by design or by integrating existing ML solutions into industrial pipelines.




You participate in the development, deployment and monitoring of AI services, which means you contribute to data quality checks, data flow design, the design of the models themselves and their overall integration into the production environment.




AND IN DETAIL

You facilitate the communication between AI & Analytics teams and IT production with regards to the deployment of ML models, ensuring that models put in production are equipped with the appropriate data pipelines and monitoring.
You work with the Data Scientists to define and develop the target solution with production constraints in mind. This allows to select the correct run infrastructure and serving model (e.g. data ingestion scheme, API synchronicity …) to address the business requirements (real-time responses, processing volumetry …).
You contribute to the automation of the different elements of the ML pipeline in order to integrate and deploy them in the production environment (e.g. building Docker/VM images, prepare unitary, regression and integration tests …).
You support Data Scientists on the usage of the existing industrial solutions available to build and monitor AI services (i.e. the CI/CD tools).
You support IT Production on the parameterization of the target environment.
You ensure that the model runs without errors, is retrained if needed (incl. automatically) and is monitored both from the IT and the business perspective.




YOUR TALENTS AND COMPETENCES

A profound knowledge of English is mandatory. Knowledge of Dutch and/or French is a plus.
You have at least 3 years of relevant experience with:

- Basic knowledge of Linux platform

- Containerization/virtualization

- AI platforms & IDEs

- CI/CD

- Code, model & data versioning

- Python

- Usage of package managing tools and experience in dependency management

- PostgreSQL

It is preferable you have experience with:

- Integration using different technologies and infra components

- Model compression techniques

- ELT/ETL tools

- Big data tools (Spark)

- Data flow processing

- Data visualization tools

You have a knowledge of agile methodology.
You have strong communication skills, oral and written. You are open to other’s opinions, ideas and feedback.
You work results driven, have attention to detail and you are a real problem solver. You can think out of the box and outside existing processes and frameworks.
You proactively invest time in continuous learning and knowledge improvement.
You work with energy and empowerment to deliver great results and a large contribution to the company’s success.




WHAT WE HAVE TO OFFER

OUR IMPACT

We strongly believe in the positive impact the financial sector can have on the world. BNP Paribas Fortis offers sustainable and responsible investment products and solutions, and encourages social entrepreneurship. Together with our customers, we work towards a better future every day.




YOUR CAREER PERSPECTIVES

We offer you a wide range of training courses, workshops and webinars to choose from depending on your availability, interests and ambitions.




OUR OFFER

You will benefit from our Smart Working program: offering flexibility on workplace (work everywhere, home working) and time management.




OUR ENGAGEMENT

At BNP Paribas Fortis, we want to attract and retain all talent, whatever their gender, age, background or sexual orientation, and irrespective of whether they are living with a disability, as every person has their own experiences and their own identity. All of our full-time vacancies are also open to candidates wishing to work on an 80% or 90% full-time equivalent basis.




TEMPTED BY THE CHALLENGE?

A first selection is made based on your CV and motivation letter. Are we convinced that you are the right candidate? Then we will contact you.




Good luck!




Is this position not for you, but do you know someone who is cut out for this job? Feel free to share it with friends and family!

Title: Solver - Data Science & Machine Learning Specialist
Description:
About Exsolvæ:

Exsolvæ is a Brussels-based consultancy at the forefront of Data and Artificial Intelligence innovation. We specialize in providing expert Consultancy, Audit, and Solution Development services to empower our partners in overcoming unique challenges. Our holistic approach fosters collaboration across diverse domains, including Data Science, Advanced Analytics, and Artificial Intelligence.




At Exsolvæ, our "Solvers" are passionate professionals equipped with cutting-edge tools, a culture of continuous learning, and an unwavering commitment to delivering high-impact solutions.




We are seeking a Data Science & Machine Learning Specialist with a proven ability to design, develop, and deploy transformative AI and machine learning solutions.




Your Role:

As a Data Science & Machine Learning Specialist, you will work alongside multidisciplinary teams to unlock the full potential of data assets for clients. You will design state-of-the-art ML models, develop data-driven insights, and deploy production-grade AI solutions. Leveraging your expertise, you will help clients overcome their most pressing challenges and create sustainable value using AI and ML.




What We’re Looking For:




Required Skills and Qualifications

Educational Background: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, Computer Science, or a related field.
Languages: Written & Spoken Fluency in English AND French or Dutch
Seniority: 3-7 years of work experience
Programming Skills: Expertise in Python and SQL, with experience in big data tools like Apache Spark or Databricks.
Machine Learning Mastery: Proficiency in TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn for designing, training, and deploying ML models.
Cloud Expertise: Hands-on experience with Azure Machine Learning, AWS SageMaker, or GCP Vertex AI for scalable AI deployments.
Data Visualization: Proficiency in tools like Tableau, Power BI, and Python-based libraries such as Matplotlib, Seaborn, and Plotly.
Statistics and Mathematics: Deep understanding of linear algebra, calculus, probability, and advanced statistical techniques.
Soft Skills: Exceptional communication, critical thinking, and stakeholder management skills.




Preferred Skills

Familiarity with advanced ML techniques, such as reinforcement learning, graph ML, and large language models (LLMs).
Experience with MLOps tools like MLflow, Kubeflow, and Docker/Kubernetes.
Knowledge of causal inference frameworks (e.g., DoWhy, EconML) and time-series forecasting methods.
Certifications such as Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate, AWS Certified Machine Learning, or Google Professional ML Engineer.




What You’ll Do:




Core Expertise

Client Engagement: Collaborate with clients to identify data challenges, define objectives, and recommend AI/ML solutions that align with business goals.
Model Development: Design and train advanced machine learning models using frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn.
Insight Generation: Transform complex datasets into actionable insights using statistical analysis and advanced visualization tools like Power BI or Tableau.




Technical Implementation

Machine Learning Solutions: Develop models for classification, regression, clustering, and NLP using modern techniques, including deep learning and reinforcement learning.
Data Engineering: Collaborate with Data Engineers to build robust data pipelines and optimize data for ML applications using platforms like Azure, AWS, or GCP.
MLOps: Deploy and maintain models in production environments using MLOps pipelines with tools like MLflow or Kubeflow.
Cloud Deployment: Implement AI workflows on cloud platforms such as Azure Machine Learning, AWS SageMaker, or GCP Vertex AI with scalability and performance in mind.




Research and Innovation

Stay updated on advancements in AI/ML technologies and incorporate state-of-the-art practices into client projects.
Explore innovative methodologies like transfer learning, Vision Transformers, and graph neural networks to enhance solutions.




Project Management

Lead end-to-end ML projects, from problem definition to model deployment, ensuring alignment with client objectives and deadlines.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including Data Engineers and Solution Architects, to deliver comprehensive solutions.




Training and Support

Conduct workshops and training sessions to empower client teams in adopting and managing AI/ML solutions.
Provide ongoing support to ensure the scalability and performance of deployed AI systems.




Why Join Us?

Impactful Projects: Work on transformative AI/ML initiatives across industries like finance, healthcare, retail, and energy.
Continuous Learning: Access to the latest tools, certifications, and training opportunities to remain at the cutting edge of AI and ML.
Collaborative Culture: Be part of a team that values knowledge sharing and collective growth.
Hybrid Flexibility: Enjoy a balanced work model with opportunities for remote and in-office collaboration.
Competitive Compensation: Benefit from an attractive salary, performance-based bonuses, and comprehensive benefits.




If you are a driven professional with a passion for Artificial Intelligence and a proven ability to design and deploy impactful AI/ML solutions, we’d love to hear from you!

Title: Data Scientist H/F
Description:
A propos de JEMS

Nous sommes le seul industriel de la donnée en Europe. Notre métier est de créer, manager et exploiter le patrimoine data de nos clients.

Nous avons la conviction que chaque entreprise peut adopter une démarche innovante de gestion de la donnée et créer des cas d’usage disruptifs en réduisant l'impact écologique et en diminuant la dette technique.

Nous comptons plus de 840 collaborateurs en mission chez nos clients grands comptes dans tout secteur d’activité : banque, assurance, santé, énergie, e-commerce, automobile, luxe, retail, transport, agritech…

Vos missions

Vous Aurez La Charge De

Nous recherchons un(e) Data Scientist capable de trouver des solutions innovantes et robustes à l'ensemble des problématiques Data. Gourou de la donnée, vous vous amusez à faire parler les données et à les mettre au service des entreprises. Vous êtes donc à la croisée d'enjeux fonctionnels et stratégiques :


Étudier des données en possession de l’entreprise
Définir et récupérer des données pertinentes à extraire et à traiter en lien avec la production de l’entreprise, la vente ou encore liées aux données clients
Développer des algorithmes permettant d’améliorer les résultats de recherches et de ciblages
Élaborer des modèles prédictifs afin d’anticiper l’évolution des données et tendances relatives à l’activité de l’entreprise


Vos compétences

En tant que Data Scientist H/F vous maîtrisez :


L'architecture des bases de données décisionnelles (data warehouse)
Les mathématiques appliquées : construire des algorithmes pour améliorer les résultats de recherches et de ciblages
Les statistiques


Et Vous Disposez


De solides compétences en programmation informatique (Python, R…)
D'une expertise en algorithmie et gestion des bases de données (NoSQL, Cassandra…)
De la connaissance des méthodologies agiles


Votre profil

Diplômé(e) d'une école d'ingénieur ou d'une université, vous justifiez d'au minimum 3 ans d'expérience professionnelle dans un contexte projet Data. Rigoureux(se), proactif(ve) et autonome vous restez en veille technologique et êtes force de proposition. Vous êtes capable de prendre de la hauteur et vous adapter aux enjeux du projet.

Avantages à travailler chez JEMS


Une JEMS Académie au service de votre montée en compétences (formations et certifications sur les technologies de pointe)
Un accompagnement personnalisé et un management de proximité pour vous proposer des évolutions de carrière
Une intégration dans des communautés techniques et de pratiques JEMS (encadrement par des experts, échanges sur les bonnes pratiques, favoriser l'innovation...)
Une entreprise reconnue "Great Place To Work"
Des évènements et séminaires inoubliables, des soirées d'agence conviviales


Mobilité

Une mobilité nationale et internationale pour vous accompagner dans vos projets de vie.

Diversité

Le Groupe JEMS porte fièrement sa valeur "Diversité" en se mobilisant pour l'inclusion et l'égalité des chances et en luttant contre toutes formes de discrimination.

Tous nos postes sont ouverts aux personnes en situation de handicap.
Show more

Title: Internship - Data Science
Description:
Introduction

Technopolis is offering a 5-6 months paid internship at our Brussels office.

About This Job

We seek to appoint an enthusiastic intern to gain first-hand insights in applying data science techniques for policy analysis. It is an exciting time to join the growing data science work at Technopolis Group, where we are deploying new tools across our practice to enhance our policy analysis capacity, from generative AI to reproduceable analytical pipelines. You will mainly focus on developing cross-cutting tools and techniques that can be applied across the company, as well as contribute to specific projects.

Your profile

Applicants Suitable For This Position Should Have


Recently finalised university education (master) or a student currently in the last year of a Master programme, preferably in data science, applied statistics, or related fields. Priority will be given to applicants that combine data science with economics or public policy, either in your studies or in past professional experience.
Experience of programming languages for data manipulation, especially Python, R and SQL.
Some knowledge of modern data science tools and concepts such as git, Github, Visual Studio, environment variables.
Experience and interest in data science techniques such as generative AI and other machine learning techniques.
Interest in widening your skillset beyond data science: we develop fully-rounded analysts who are also capable of applying data science techniques – not just programmers.
Interest in European Commission policies, in particular in science, technology and innovation;
Excellent communication skills in English;
Ability to work independently and as part of a team;
Willingness to learn about new topics, methods, and skills.


The Following Will Be Considered As a Plus


Proficiency in other languages.


Your Responsibilities

Typical tasks may include:


Developing data analysis pipelines;
Applying supervised and unsupervised machine learning techniques to mainly text data;
Data wrangling;
Data visualisation;
Reporting results of analysis;
Assist in other tasks such as literature reviews, case studies and other tasks where needed.


Our offer

Skills

The successful candidate will work as a paid intern in our Brussels office. The role provides the opportunity to gain experience in working at the forefront of European policymaking, to develop analytical skills, and to experience a multinational, friendly business environment. Our package includes:


Paid internship
Belgian phone subscription
Monthly allowance for the transportation card
Training and mentoring possibilities
Working in an international company with 12 offices and more than 290 colleagues


Interested? Apply directly

Applicants need to have either EU citizenship or a valid work permit.

For any questions on the recruitment, please contact recruitment_be@technopolis-group.com (reference DSU_INT2025).

Only the short-listed candidates will be contacted.

About Us

Technopolis Group started as a consultancy firm for the evaluation of science, technology and innovation. While evaluation is still at the core of our company, we have over the years built up the know-how to support decision making on a broad range of topics. Our experts provide strategy and foresight, manage networks and provide project management support for even the most complex projects. We are acquainted with a wide range of quantitative methods and deliver advanced data analytics that is ahead of the curve. We evaluate policies, evaluate their impact and communicate them effectively to experts and the broader public. We never settle for out-of-the-box solutions but work with our clients to find the approach that best fits their needs.

We work with decision-makers in different levels and fields, from international institutions, such as the European Commission and multilateral development banks, to regional and local authorities. Our clients include universities and R&D centres, network organisations such as business associations, clusters and incubators as well as governments.

About Us

Technopolis Group started as a consultancy firm for the evaluation of science, technology and innovation. While evaluation is still at the core of our company, we have over the years built up the know-how to support decision making on a broad range of topics. Our experts provide strategy and foresight, manage networks and provide project management support for even the most complex projects. We are acquainted with a wide range of quantitative methods and deliver advanced data analytics that is ahead of the curve. We evaluate policies, evaluate their impact and communicate them effectively to experts and the broader public. We never settle for out-of-the-box solutions but work with our clients to find the approach that best fits their needs.

We work with decision-makers in different levels and fields, from international institutions, such as the European Commission and multilateral development banks, to regional and local authorities. Our clients include universities and R&D centres, network organisations such as business associations, clusters and incubators as well as governments.

Title: Natural Language Processing Engineer
Description:
For our client, a leading innovator in the Belgian telecom sector, we are currently looking for an experience NLP designer to join their conversation design team in charge of their chatbot:




As an NLP designer, you will be part of the Conversation Design Chapter, working in the Digital Assistant Squad (a multi-disciplinary and agile team responsible for the delivery and implementation of the chatbot and the voice assistant).




Concretely, in the chapter you will work in close collaboration with the other NLP designers of the team to maintain and design the NLP models of the chatbot and the voice assistant. You are constantly looking for optimizations to increase the accuracy of the bots. You will also train the NLP and do exhaustive debugging.




You will also work with the conversation designers within the chapter. They design bot flows and write the conversational copy:

• You bring NLP/NLU knowledge to the team to successfully shape bot conversations

• You give your input to improve logic of existing and upcoming flows

• You have basic knowledge of intents and entities and you are aware of trends in the field of NLP (LLMs, Conversational AI etc.)

Your work will be used in both sales and after-sales contexts for various customer segments.

We are searching for a colleague with a strong affinity with digital customer needs, that is customer-oriented and that has a flexible, positive attitude, especially in regards to change and digital transformation.




Required competencies:

• Strong analytical skills, rigorous, and detailed-oriented mindset

• Experience on AI projects, ideally on NLP/NLU of digital assistants

• Good writing skills in at least 2 of the following languages: Dutch/French/English and at least a good understanding of Dutch

• Self-steering

• Experience with working in an agile context

• Ability to work under pressure




Nice to have:

• Experience with Dialogflow CX, Vertex AI

• A first experience with NLP, Python and JSON

• Knowledge of LLM integrations




An ideal candidate is…

• Aware of AI possibilities and limitations

• Tech-savvy

• A good communicator, both with management and with peers

• Creative

• Customer-oriented

• Team player

Title: SOAR Developer
Description:
SOAR Developer (Palo Alto, XSOAR, Cortex) – Banking – Brussels

Daily rate: €600 - €800

Duration: 12 Months

Start: ASAP




My banking client is looking for a XSOAR Developer to join on a freelance mission based in Brussels. They are responsible for the development and maintenance of the code and capabilities of the Security Orchestration, Automation and Response (SOAR) platform (Cortex XSOAR).




You will report to the Manager of the Detection & Response Engineering and will work jointly with our detection engineering, threat detection and response teams to specify clear priorities, evaluate technical trade-offs, and build high-impact features within the SOAR platform.

The candidates’ main responsibilities will be to:

1. Focus on the development, maintenance, and delivery of new Security Orchestration and Automation content including custom SOAR Playbooks, Automations/Scripts, Jobs, dashboards, reports, widgets, RESTful API integrations, and code via Continuous Integration / Continuous Delivery pipelines adhering to an Agile development practice

2. Reduce Incident Response efforts and increase quality leveraging XSOAR for Security Orchestration, Automation and Response (SOAR)

3. Automate manual SOC procedures and develop, implement, and maintain playbooks

4. Document SOAR workflows, scripts, and develop, test and debug code and use established code repository for tracking.

5. Use python/other scripting languages to perform the customizations to develop the required automation.

6. Work with the existing playbook framework and ensure the amendments are hooked properly to the existing framework.

7. Prioritize and coordinate backlog of SOAR integration and automation requests, making sure we have a healthy balance between defect resolution and new features.

8. Work in partnership with the incident response team to design to identify opportunities for improvement




Qualifications

Technical Skills

• 3+ year prior experience in a similar position

• Advanced knowledge of the Palo Alto Cortex XSOAR platform

• Ability to create documentation for Palo Alto Networks Cortex XSOAR playbooks

• Proficient in Python, JavaScript, and PowerShell are an asset

• Good understanding of REST/SOAP/WSDL/XML (Web services)

• Understanding of cybersecurity incident response procedures, experience as a Security Incident Responder or SOC analyst is a plus

• Strong understanding of cybersecurity technologies, protocols, and applications




Soft Skills

• Strong analytical skills to evaluate complex multivariate problems and find a systematic approach to gain a quick resolution, often under stress

• Strong problem solving, documentation, process execution, time management and organizational skills.

• Ability to communicate complex information, concepts, or ideas in a confident and well-organized manner through verbal, written, and/or visual means.

• Passion and drive to work in start-up division with potential of significant growth in scope and services

• Fast and independent learner, with ambition to self-improve

Title: Python Developer
Description:
SII Belgium is seeking a highly motivated and ambitious Python Developer to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for designing and developing software applications, as well as maintaining and improving existing systems. You would join various teams working in AGILE mode for projects in the Energy, Retail, Banking or Media sectors. 

SII is a European digital and engineering services company of 16,000 experts. SII Belgium supports large businesses in adopting new technologies and innovation management. SII values empowerment and entrepreneurship, providing a fulfilling work environment for employees. Our mission is to contribute to the design and development of future products and services for customers. SII is committed to a sustainable digital world and is recognized as a Great Workplace.  

Key Responsibilities: 


Support design and troubleshooting efforts
Determine operational feasibility by evaluating analysis, problem definition, requirements, solution development, and proposed solutions.
Develop software solutions by studying information needs, conferring with users, and studying systems flow, data usage, and work processes.
Promote technical growth, making recommendations on software.
Ensure continuous integration and deployment of solutions
Deliver scalable web applications according to agreed planning and budget
Test applications and overcome technical issues encountered
Add value to the sales cycle by giving input to your commercial colleagues (presales)
Train customers and users


Requirements:


Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science
At least 3 years of relevant experience, you’re able to write clear and maintainable code
Familiar with Agile methodology such as Scrum; TDD
Good knowledge of Python (Flask, Pandas, Celery ...)
Experienced in Unit-testing
Experience with Angular, PostgreSQL is an added value.
Problem solving and debugging skills
General best practices and design practices
Fluent in English and Dutch or French


We offer: 


A challenging and varied role in a growing company 
Opportunity to work with the latest technologies 
Competitive salary and benefits 
Opportunity to improve your skills and knowledge through training and certification 
Warm and open company culture, supported by an international group 


   If you are an ambitious and motivated Python developer looking for an exciting opportunity with a growing company, we encourage you to apply for this posit.

Title: Job | Data Scientist AI Lab | Bruxelles
Description:
Description

Grâce au machine learning (ML) et l'intelligence artificielle (IA), vous générez des produits basés sur les data et vous menez à bien les défis opérationnels les plus urgents.

Votre job en deux mots

Vous travaillez dans l'AI Lab au sein d'une équipe jeune, innovante et dynamique pour réaliser des projets d'IA transversaux end-to-end.

Vous utilisez divers types de data, internes et externes, structurées et non structurées, pour améliorer les use cases existants et en lancer de nouveaux. Cela peut se faire pour toutes les activités bancaires et d'assurances : marketing, compliance, fraude, automatisation des processus…

Votre tâche est très variée :


Vous développez/améliorez des modèles de prévision à l’aide de techniques statistiques et du machine learning.
Vous utilisez des large language models ou d'autres modèles d'IA générative pour fournir des solutions concrètes aux besoins commerciaux.
Vous établissez, analysez et interprétez des hypothèses business et vous exploitez des datasets.
Vous recommandez des idées au business à l’aide de visualisations/algorithmes prévisionnels lorsque des data/résultats sont disponibles.
Vous aidez les utilisateurs à comprendre les principes de la science des données et, si nécessaire, vous commentez les comportements du modèle et les actions de correction possibles.



Pas besoin d’être un oiseau rare

Chez nous, vous pouvez vous distinguer et révéler le meilleur de vous-même si vous répondez aux critères suivants :

Vous avez un master ou un doctorat en sciences, avec d’excellents résultats universitaires sur le plan technique (économétrie, sciences informatiques, intelligence artificielle, etc.).

Vous êtes expert dans les techniques de machine learning et vous êtes disposé à actualiser cette connaissance. Une connaissance approfondie d’algorithmes tels que Random Forests, Neural Networks et Reinforcement Learning est un must.

Vous avez déjà de l'experience avec l'application des models d'IA générative comme des large language models.

Vous disposez de solides aptitudes de programmation en Python et SQL et vous avez des notions de MLOps & CI/CD.

Vous maîtrisez le français ou le néerlandais et vous avez une connaissance passive de l’autre langue, et de l’anglais.

Grâce à vos compétences narratives et à votre aptitude à visualiser des données, vous êtes capable d’expliquer des analyses complexes à un public profane. Vous disposez d’excellentes capacités de communication écrite et orale au niveau technique et business.

Vous avez soif de connaissances, non seulement pour maîtriser de nouveaux algorithmes et technologies, mais aussi sur le plan interpersonnel. Vous êtes conscient que la valeur de votre travail est synonyme de qualité et d’acceptation et vous tenez à combiner ces deux aspects.

Vous disposez d’une capacité exceptionnelle pour résoudre les problèmes : vous savez qu'une bonne compréhension du problème représente au moins 90% de la solution, vous faites preuve de créativité et de ténacité pour approfondir les problèmes et chercher des solutions.

Vous marquerez encore plus de points si :


Vous êtes bilingue (français/néerlandais).
Vous avez de l’expérience dans le développement de produits data et software, de la conception à la production.
Vous disposez d'une expérience antérieure du Natural Language Processing.
Vous connaissez Spark et les libraries/tools pour les visualisations (comme Plotly/Dash ou React).
Vous avez des notions du cloud, de préférence Azure.



Belfius prend soin de ses talents

Outre la possibilité de faire votre chemin dans un job qui vous plaît, nous vous offrons un contrat à temps plein à durée indéterminée avec :


Un salaire attractif complété par une offre innovante vous octroyant un budget à utiliser selon vos préférences personnelles (p. ex. voiture, vélo, PC, smartphone, tablette, loyer ou crédit hypothécaire sous certaines conditions) et des avantages extralégaux, tels que des chèques-repas, des avantages sur les produits et services internes, une assurance hospitalisation et une assurance groupe.
Des possibilités de développement par le biais d'un large éventail de formations et des opportunités de carrière dans l’ensemble du groupe Belfius
Un bon équilibre entre vie professionnelle et vie privée grâce à des horaires flexibles, à la combinaison du travail au bureau et à domicile et un nombre attractif de jours de congé
Un lieu de travail moderne au cœur de Bruxelles, avec une salle de sport branchée, un délicieux restaurant sain et des espaces de réunion confortables, le tout à quelques pas de la rue commerciale, de la gare Bruxelles-Nord et de la station métro Rogier

Belfius prend soin de ses talents

Outre la possibilité de faire votre chemin dans un job qui vous plaît, nous vous offrons un contrat à temps plein à durée indéterminée avec :

  • Un salaire attractif complété par une offre innovante vous octroyant un budget à utiliser selon vos préférences personnelles (p. ex. voiture, vélo, PC, smartphone, tablette, loyer ou crédit hypothécaire sous certaines conditions) et des avantages extralégaux, tels que des chèques-repas, des avantages sur les produits et services internes, une assurance hospitalisation et une assurance groupe.
  • Des possibilités de développement par le biais d'un large éventail de formations et des opportunités de carrière dans l’ensemble du groupe Belfius
  • Un bon équilibre entre vie professionnelle et vie privée grâce à des horaires flexibles, à la combinaison du travail au bureau et à domicile et un nombre attractif de jours de congé
  • Un lieu de travail moderne au cœur de Bruxelles, avec une salle de sport branchée, un délicieux restaurant sain et des espaces de réunion confortables, le tout à quelques pas de la rue commerciale, de la gare Bruxelles-Nord et de la station métro Rogier

Title: Research Scientist
Description:
The neuroscience department is searching for a highly motivated junior scientist with extensive
experience in brain histology to join our team working on drug discovery in the field of
neurodegeneration. The selected candidate will actively participate in the identification of new targets
and the development of therapeutics to treat neurodegenerative diseases and epilepsy. The main role
of this position is to supervise immunohistochemistry and image analysis studies to characterize in vivo
models and assess drug efficacy. The preferred candidate will have strong knowledge in neuroscience,
microscopy, and expertise in various histology techniques and image analysis, including basic
programming (Python, R)

Our client is a leading global bio-pharmaceutical company dedicated to improving patient outcomes through innovative biologics-based therapies. With a strong commitment to scientific excellence and rigorous quality standards, they are at the forefront of developing life-changing treatments. Their collaborative and dynamic work environment fosters growth, innovation, and the highest level of professional integrity. Join this prestigious organization and contribute to their mission of advancing healthcare worldwide.

Key Responsibilities:

Perform histology work with a focus on brain tissue from rodents, primates, and humans.
Specialize in immunohistochemistry, microscopy (confocal, widefield), and image analysis.
Section brain tissue and apply stains to highlight specific elements within the brain.
Utilize various microscopes for detailed examination and analysis.
Conduct image analysis using specialized software; basic proficiency in programming (Python or similar) is a plus.
Present findings in team meetings and prepare comprehensive reports in both English and French.

Requirements:

A background in histology with at least 2-3 months of relevant experience, preferably gained during a thesis.
Scientific education, ideally a PhD, but practical lab experience is highly valued.
Proficiency in both French and English.
Strong communication skills with the ability to work independently or as part of a team.
Adaptability to changing project priorities and a flexible work environment.
Potential for remote work after completion of laboratory tasks.

Ideal Candidate:

Hands-on experience in histology, preferably from an academic or industry lab.
Flexibility to work with different types of brain tissue and engage in interdisciplinary projects.
Proficiency in both the practical and analytical aspects of histology, with an interest in the technical side, including microscopy and image analysis.
A strong interest in neuroscience and a commitment to working on innovative and complex projects.

If you are ready to make your mark for patients and contribute to a team dedicated to achieving the highest standards of quality, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

Title: Solver - Generative AI Specialist
Description:
About Exsolvæ:

Exsolvæ is a Brussels-based consultancy specializing in Data and Artificial Intelligence innovation, providing expert Consultancy, Audit, and Solution Development services tailored to empower its partners and address their unique challenges. We tackle complex challenges with a holistic approach, fostering collaboration across diverse expertise areas, including Data Engineering, Artificial Intelligence, Advanced Analytics, and Governance.




Our "Solvers" are passionate professionals empowered by cutting-edge tools, a culture of knowledge sharing, and continuous learning opportunities. We are seeking a Generative AI Specialist to join our team of experts, helping our clients leverage the power of advanced AI technologies to transform their operations.




Your Role:

As a Generative AI Specialist, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams and clients to design, develop, and deploy innovative AI solutions, with a particular focus on generative models and their applications.




What We’re Looking For:




Required Skills and Qualifications (Mandatory)

Educational Background: Master’s or PhD in Computer Science, Data Science, AI, or related fields.
Seniority: 3-7 years of work experience including at least 2 in the aforementioned specialty
Languages: Written & Spoken Fluency in English AND French or Dutch
Technical Expertise: Proven experience with generative AI frameworks like OpenAI, LangChain, Hugging Face, or similar.
Programming Proficiency: Advanced skills in Python and familiarity with AI libraries such as TensorFlow or PyTorch.
Cloud Platforms: Hands-on experience with AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud for deploying AI models.
Communication Skills: Strong ability to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.




Preferred Skills

Experience in fine-tuning and customizing large language models (LLMs).
Familiarity with agent-based systems for task automation.
Knowledge of MLOps tools and best practices for AI model deployment and monitoring.
Strong business acumen to align AI solutions with strategic goals.




What You’ll Do:




Core Expertise

Client Collaboration: Engage with clients to identify business needs, explore AI opportunities, and deliver tailored solutions leveraging generative AI.
Use Case Development: Analyze client challenges to propose and implement generative AI applications such as text generation, image synthesis, content creation, or workflow automation.




Technical Implementation

Model Development: Design, build, and fine-tune generative AI models using frameworks like OpenAI, LangChain, and Hugging Face.
Agent Design: Create agent-based architectures for real-time decision-making and task automation.
Integration: Connect generative AI systems with external tools, APIs, and enterprise systems to optimize workflow and performance.




Research and Innovation

Stay updated on the latest advancements in generative AI and contribute to internal R&D initiatives.
Experiment with emerging models, techniques, and tools to ensure cutting-edge solutions for clients.




Project Management

Plan, execute, and oversee the delivery of AI projects, ensuring timely and high-quality outcomes.
Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams to ensure smooth project integration.




Training and Support

Conduct workshops and training sessions for clients to empower their teams with generative AI capabilities.
Provide ongoing support for deployed solutions to ensure scalability and optimization.




Why Join Us?

Impactful Projects: Contribute to diverse and innovative AI projects across industries like finance, healthcare, and manufacturing.
Continuous Learning: Benefit from the latest GenAI tools as well as an annual budget for certifications, training, and conferences to stay ahead in your field.
Collaborative Environment: Join a team that values collective intelligence and a supportive culture.
Hybrid Flexibility: Enjoy a balanced work model that offers remote and in-office collaboration.
Competitive Package: Attractive salary, performance bonuses, and comprehensive benefits.

Show more
HTML:
About Exsolvæ:

Exsolvæ is a Brussels-based consultancy specializing in Data and Artificial Intelligence innovation, providing expert Consultancy, Audit, and Solution Development services tailored to empower its partners and address their unique challenges. We tackle complex challenges with a holistic approach, fostering collaboration across diverse expertise areas, including Data Engineering, Artificial Intelligence, Advanced Analytics, and Governance.


Our "Solvers" are passionate professionals empowered by cutting-edge tools, a culture of knowledge sharing, and continuous learning opportunities. We are seeking a Generative AI Specialist to join our team of experts, helping our clients leverage the power of advanced AI technologies to transform their operations.


Your Role:

As a Generative AI Specialist, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams and clients to design, develop, and deploy innovative AI solutions, with a particular focus on generative models and their applications.


What We’re Looking For:


Required Skills and Qualifications (Mandatory)

  • Educational Background: Master’s or PhD in Computer Science, Data Science, AI, or related fields.
  • Seniority: 3-7 years of work experience including at least 2 in the aforementioned specialty
  • Languages: Written & Spoken Fluency in English AND French or Dutch
  • Technical Expertise: Proven experience with generative AI frameworks like OpenAI, LangChain, Hugging Face, or similar.
  • Programming Proficiency: Advanced skills in Python and familiarity with AI libraries such as TensorFlow or PyTorch.
  • Cloud Platforms: Hands-on experience with AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud for deploying AI models.
  • Communication Skills: Strong ability to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.


Preferred Skills

  • Experience in fine-tuning and customizing large language models (LLMs).
  • Familiarity with agent-based systems for task automation.
  • Knowledge of MLOps tools and best practices for AI model deployment and monitoring.
  • Strong business acumen to align AI solutions with strategic goals.


What You’ll Do:


Core Expertise

  • Client Collaboration: Engage with clients to identify business needs, explore AI opportunities, and deliver tailored solutions leveraging generative AI.
  • Use Case Development: Analyze client challenges to propose and implement generative AI applications such as text generation, image synthesis, content creation, or workflow automation.


Technical Implementation

  • Model Development: Design, build, and fine-tune generative AI models using frameworks like OpenAI, LangChain, and Hugging Face.
  • Agent Design: Create agent-based architectures for real-time decision-making and task automation.
  • Integration: Connect generative AI systems with external tools, APIs, and enterprise systems to optimize workflow and performance.


Research and Innovation

  • Stay updated on the latest advancements in generative AI and contribute to internal R&D initiatives.
  • Experiment with emerging models, techniques, and tools to ensure cutting-edge solutions for clients.


Project Management

  • Plan, execute, and oversee the delivery of AI projects, ensuring timely and high-quality outcomes.
  • Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams to ensure smooth project integration.


Training and Support

  • Conduct workshops and training sessions for clients to empower their teams with generative AI capabilities.
  • Provide ongoing support for deployed solutions to ensure scalability and optimization.


Why Join Us?

  • Impactful Projects: Contribute to diverse and innovative AI projects across industries like finance, healthcare, and manufacturing.
  • Continuous Learning: Benefit from the latest GenAI tools as well as an annual budget for certifications, training, and conferences to stay ahead in your field.
  • Collaborative Environment: Join a team that values collective intelligence and a supportive culture.
  • Hybrid Flexibility: Enjoy a balanced work model that offers remote and in-office collaboration.
  • Competitive Package: Attractive salary, performance bonuses, and comprehensive benefits.

Title: Job | Data Scientist AI Lab | Brussel
Description:
Omschrijving

Door machine learning (ML) en artificiële intelligentie (AI) te gebruiken genereer je datagestuurde producten en breng je de meest urgente zakelijke uitdagingen tot een goed einde.

De job in een notendop

Je werkt in het AI Lab binnen een jong, vernieuwend en dynamisch team om transversale AI-projecten end-to-end te realiseren.

Je gebruikt diverse soorten data – interne en externe, gestructureerde en ongestructureerde – om bestaande use cases te verbeteren en nieuwe use cases op te starten. Dat kan voor alle bank- en verzekeringsactiviteiten: marketing, compliance, fraude, procesautomatisering…

Wat je doet, is heel divers:


Je bouwt/verbetert voorspellende modellen met behulp van statistische technieken en machine learning.
Je gebruikt large language models of andere generatieve AI modellen om concrete oplossingen te bieden voor business-noden.
Je maakt, analyseert en interpreteert businesshypotheses en benut datasets.
Je beveelt de business ideeën aan wanneer er data/resultaten beschikbaar zijn aan de hand van visualisaties/voorspellende algoritmes.
Je helpt gebruikers om inzicht te verwerven in de principes van datawetenschap en je licht indien nodig de gedragingen van het model en mogelijke corrigerende acties toe.



Jij hoeft geen witte raaf te zijn

Al kan je er bij ons wel één worden. Bij ons mag je volop je vleugels uitslaan indien je voldoet aan de volgende voorwaarden:


Een master of doctoraat in de wetenschappen met uitstekende academische resultaten op technisch gebied (econometrie, computerwetenschappen, artificiële intelligentie, e.a.).
Deskundigheid op het vlak van machine learning technieken en bereidheid om die kennis up-to-date te houden; een diepgaande kennis van algoritmes zoals Random Forests, Neural Networks en Reinforcement Learning is hierbij een must.
Ervaring met het toepassen van Generative AI modellen zoals large language models.
Sterke programmeervaardigheden in Python en SQL en noties van MLOps & CI/CD.
Uitgebreide kennis van Nederlands of Frans, met passieve kennis van de andere taal, en Engels.
Ervaring in het verklaren van complexe analyses aan een niet-technisch publiek aan de hand van je verhalende competenties en je capaciteit om data te visualiseren; je beschikt over uitmuntende mondelinge en schriftelijke communicatievaardigheden op technisch en businessniveau.
Honger naar kennis, niet alleen om nieuwe algoritmes en technologieën te beheersen, maar ook op interpersoonlijk vlak; je bent je ervan bewust dat de waarde van jouw werk neerkomt op kwaliteit x acceptatie en je wilt sleutelen aan beide aspecten.
Uitzonderlijke probleemoplossende vaardigheden: je weet dat het juiste inzicht in een probleem minstens 90% van de oplossing uitmaakt, je geeft blijk van creativiteit en volharding bij het doorgronden van problemen en het zoeken van oplossingen.



Je scoort extra met:


Tweetaligheid (Nederlands/Frans).
Ervaring met het bouwen van data- en softwareproducten, van ontwerp tot productie.
Eerdere ervaring met Natural Language Processing.
Kennis van Spark en libraries/tools voor visualisatie (zoals Plotly/Dash of React).
Noties van cloud, bij voorkeur Azure.



Belfius koestert zijn talenten

Behalve de kans om elke dag te shinen, bieden wij jou een fulltime contract van onbepaalde duur met:


Een mooi loon aangevuld met een innovatief aanbod om een persoonlijk budget samen te stellen dat je kan besteden volgens je voorkeuren (bv. wagen, fiets, pc, smartphone, tablet, huisvesting onder bepaalde voorwaarden) en extralegale voordelen zoals maaltijdcheques, personeelsvoordeel op eigen producten en diensten, en een hospitalisatie- en groepsverzekering.
Mogelijkheden te over om je te ontwikkelen door een brede waaier aan opleidingen en carrièrekansen in de hele Belfius-groep
Een goede werk-privé balans dankzij flexibele uren, de combinatie kantoor- en thuiswerk en een aantrekkelijk aantal vakantiedagen
Een moderne werkplek in het hart van Brussel met een coole fitness, een lekker gezond restaurant en gezellige ontmoetingsruimtes, dit alles op wandelafstand van de winkelstraat, het treinstation Brussel-Noord en de metrohalte Rogier

Title: Project Manager - Prompt Engineering / Data Scientist (Brussels Based)
Description:
About SailPeak

At Sailpeak, we are a Brussels-based consulting firm specializing in guiding Banking & Insurance firms through the complexities of digital transformation.




With expertise in Business Strategy, Data & AI, and Digital Transformation, Sailpeak helps clients navigate the ever-evolving landscape and reach new heights of success.




🤖 About the Role

We are looking for a Prompt Engineer / Data Scientist with 3 years of experience, working on Gen AI tools to improve internal processes




One of our leading banking clients is leveraging data science across many use cases to create value in crucial projects.




You will spearhead the transformation with tools like ChatGPT and Microsoft Office CoPilot to improve employee productivity and efficiency across processes. The use cases can come from Robotics, Compliance, Client Service Centers, Marketing, and Sales (the list keeps growing).




📊 You will:

Design and Create prompts using prompt engineering techniques
Understand business needs to identify cases where Gen AI can be leveraged to add value to our projects
Test and Evaluate the quality and accuracy of the output from your prompts
Train and Educate the rest of the business on the best practices around using GenAI & working on establishing a prompt academy (learning environment)
Document and Share your findings, results, and learnings with the rest of the business




📊 You bring to the table:

Experience working with Gen AI tools: ChatGPT, Mistral, Llama, and Microsoft Office CoPilot
Expertise in Advance Prompt Engineering from designing, creating, testing, and optimizing prompts
Independence and ability to plan your own work based on project requirements
Strategic thinking around aligning the current business needs and gaps in processes
Experience working with cross-functional teams (Engineering, Business, Product, etc.)
Stakeholder management (being able to communicate with various different stakeholders, managing roadblocks and frustrations, etc.)




🗣️ Language Skills

Fluency in English, French, and/or Dutch




🤹 Other Skills

Experience with Scrum or Agile methods is a great plus for us.
We are looking for proactive problem-solvers
You’ll be working independently & autonomously
Passion for growing, building, and continuous learning, especially around the developments within AI and Data Science
Working with cross-functional teams with different business needs, requirements, and challenges




🎁 What’s in it for you

💸 A competitive salary and benefits package.

🦾 Working on cutting-edge projects with leading banking clients, in a startup environment

💿 Exposure to a wide array of AI and data science technologies.

🫂 Mentorship from Directors and Partners with backgrounds from renowned companies like Google, PayPal, Semetis, and Sia Partners.




🧑‍🔬 The Process

Step 1: 30-minute call with our Head of Talent (Peter): focusing on your current situation, motivation, experience, and practicalities
Step 2: 30-minute call with one of our Founders (Stjepan or Nico): deep-dive into your experience
Step 3: Onsite Business Case with our team
Step 4: Offer!




Are you ready to embark on a rewarding career in management consulting with Sailpeak?




To apply for this role, kindly send your CV or reach out to careers@sailpeak.com




Set your course toward a transformative career at Sailpeak today!

Title: AI Tech Lead
Description:
🚀 Rejoignez-nous pour révolutionner la compta grâce à l'IA.

Chez Amarris Tech, nous développons des applications web innovantes qui simplifient la vie des comptables et entrepreneurs. Aujourd’hui, nous souhaitons aller plus loin en intégrant l’intelligence artificielle au cœur de nos solutions. Nous recherchons un Ingénieur IA / Développeur expérimenté en Intelligence Artificielle pour initier cette transition et accompagner notre équipe tech vers l’adoption des technologies IA.

🌟 Pourquoi nous rejoindre ?

✅ Un impact réel : Vous jouerez un rôle clé dans l’intégration de l’IA pour optimiser l’automatisation comptable et améliorer l’expérience utilisateur.

✅ Technologies modernes : Stack existante : Java (backend), MongoDB (base de données), Angular (frontend) + AWS + nouvelles briques IA à intégrer (modèles ML/NLP, LLMs, automatisation des processus…).

✅ Challenge et innovation : Mettre en place une culture data-driven, développer des algorithmes d’IA pour automatiser des tâches et améliorer la productivité.

✅ Esprit d’équipe et collaboration : Travail en mode agile avec une équipe tech motivée et ouverte à l’apprentissage de nouvelles technologies.

✅ Flexibilité : Télétravail possible, équilibre pro/perso respecté.

🎯 Qui recherchons-nous ?
Expérience :  3 à 4 ans d’expérience en développement IA / machine learning (expérience en production appréciée).
Tu es titulaire d'un bachelier/master en informatique ou en ingénieur informaticien.
Tu parles français
Tu es motivé et ta curiosité te donne envie d'apprendre
Tu n'as pas peur des défis
Tu apprécies travailler et collaborer efficacement avec les autres.
Curieux(se) et passionné(e) par l’IA et ses applications.
• Pédagogue, capable d’accompagner une équipe tech vers la montée en compétences sur l’IA.
👥 Ton rôle

🚀 Construire les bases de l’IA chez Amarris Tech

Identifier et proposer des cas d’usage IA pertinents pour nos produits.
Développer des modèles d’IA adaptés (NLP, automatisation comptable, analyse prédictive…).
Collaborer avec l’équipe pour intégrer ces modèles dans notre stack existante.
Former et accompagner l’équipe tech dans la montée en compétences sur l’IA.

🎁 Notre offre

✨ Intégrer une équipe dynamique dans une entreprise en pleine croissance.

✨ Un environnement stimulant et des projets à forte valeur ajoutée en IA.

✨ Possibilité de monter rapidement en responsabilités sur le volet IA.

✨ Télétravail possible + CDI (ou freelance) avec package salarial attractif.  

Si ce job te parle, rejoins-nous ! 🚀

Title: Applied AI Research Scientist
Description:
Company Overview

We are an early-stage, venture-backed start-up that has raised over $50M from top-tier investors in Europe and the United States. We have developed and brought to market the world's first continuous blood pressure monitor. Our technology is based on 15 years of research by our founders at the prestigious Swiss Center for Electronics and Microtechnology (CSEM). Aktiia's solution has been validated through extensive clinical trials and received a CE Mark as a Class IIa medical device giving us commercial access to 43 countries worldwide.

High blood pressure is the world's most common disease and causes 18M deaths/year. At Aktiia, we believe that our novel technology is the key to building the fundamental datasets for the next chapter of understanding and discovery in the field of blood pressure. Before Aktiia, it was not possible to do this at scale. To strengthen our team, we are looking for a:

APPLIED AI RESEARCH SCIENTIST

Responsibilities


Design, develop, optimize, and document innovative AI models for blood pressure estimation from optical signals
Analyze model limitations and devise strategies to enhance performance, addressing key challenges
Collaborate and communicate effectively with cross-functional teams to solve complex technical problems



Your profile


M.Sc. or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Mathematics, Electrical Engineering, or a relevant field
2+ years of industry experience applying Deep Learning techniques
Experience in developing, fine-tuning, and evaluating neural network architectures on large-scale datasets
Strong publication record in Machine Learning or AI
Deep understanding of statistical learning, CNNs, and RNNs
Proficiency in Python and machine learning frameworks (e.g., PyTorch, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, etc.)
Creative and hands-on approach to problem-solving
Strong communication skills in English (both written and spoken)
Motivated, proactive, and curious, with a structured, solution-oriented mindset; a team player eager to learn
Comfortable working in a multidisciplinary, multicultural, and diversity-oriented team
Experience in medical signal processing or time series analysis is a plus
Based in Switzerland, with a valid Swiss work permit


Are you passionate in solving problems with visionaries and innovative approaches? In this case you are ready to rock with Aktiia team. We look forward to receiving your application by email (18DA2655CC@jobs.workablemail.com).

Only fully documented applications (CV, diplomas) will be considered for the recruitment process. If you should not hear back from us within two weeks, your application has unfortunately not been successful for this role.
